name: Blonsters
description:
Disclamer - This game was made from the ground up in 7 days there will be a lot of bugs.

Blonsters is a fast paced shooter game where the player has to progress through a series of levels, by destroying pylons and killing enemies. All enemies and weapons within Blonsters are randomly generated from a selection of pieces. Everything in Blonsters has unique stats making every playthrough unique. Enjoy!
